description:
Clipless pedals can be daunting, but once you're used them benefits are undeniable. With their user-friendly design, the RS500s have a larger entry point for easy engagement, and lighter spring tension, so they're easier to get in and out of. Extra-wide platforms expand the contact surface between cleats and pedals, for efficient power transfer and a solid feeling when you stand on them.

  • Lightweight composite body
  • Replaceable stainless steel contact plates reduce body wear
  • Large entry target for easier engagement
  • Supplied with SM-SH11 cleat with 6° of float for comfort. Excellent for riders whose feet move naturally during their pedal stroke
  • Optional cleats include fixed SM-SH10 and front-center-pivoting SM-SH12
name: Shimano PD-RS500 SPD-SL Pedals
